Love a la mode a comedy / written by a Person of honour. Southland, Thomas.
[8], 88 p.
Printed by J.C. for John Daniel ..., London : 1663.
Preface signed: T.S. Attributed to Thomas Southland. cf. History of English drama 1660-1900 v.1 / A. Nicoll. "As it was lately acted with great applause at Middlesex-House." Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
